p.d: Félicia finally understands the secret of the Jacob family, but still has to face the police. Now that she knows a hunter is on their trail, Clara wants to get away from Beltane. Arnaud can't stand being constantly invaded by Pascal's personality; he'll have to give him his memory back. Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud Cast: Pascale Bussieres (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), MikhaIl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib) Genre: drama Parental guidance: TV-PG
